thread.section_title: CDS Home Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CDS Home Services | cdshomeservices.com
thread.title: EGAN
thread.title_full: CDS Home Services reviewed by EGAN

author: EGAN
title: EGAN
text: I have had service from CDS since early 2011 and they are by far the best company that I have dealt with through the years. Normal maintenance is done on time and done right while they have always been available when I have a question or issue that I need help with. I have never had to wait more than a few hours for a response to even the most minor question/issue. I wish all companies were at least half as good a CDS. CDS is one of the few companies that deserve to have the name "service" in their name. I take very seriously the type of reviews requested from customers as I hope others do as well and this is the first time I have given a firm this high an endorsement.
